Wayanad SilverwoodTips for Planning the Perfect Honeymoon in KeralaConclusionJoin our travel community for the latest tips, guides, and exclusive offers!Subscribe You have already subscribed our newsletter!Thanks for Subscribing our newsletter!Kerala is a “God’s Own Country” for a reason. And you couldn’t agree more after you explore, honeymoon resorts in Kerala with the best honeymoon packages that provide newlywed couples with a heavenly blend of natural beauty and luxurious accommodations, romantic experiences, and cultural richness to create memories to cherish a lifetime. Kerala being the cleanest and the first state in India to receive rainfall is truly a treasure to explore and experience once-in-a-lifetime moments. Without further ado, let’s explore the best resorts in Kerala for honeymoon to relax, rewind, and enjoy the customized services. Honeymoon resorts in Kerala cater to the different preferences of everyone. It is important to pick the right Kerala Honeymoon resorts for a memorable and romantic experience. A guide to Kerala in November can be helpful when planning your trip, as some of the best types of honeymoon resorts in Kerala include: Beachfront resortsBack Water resortsHill Station resortsHeritage and Cultural ResortsThe Best Beachfront Resorts in Kerala for HoneymoonBeachfront resorts offer a secluded and romantic escape to the newlyweds with direct access to stunning beaches. These beachfront categories of Kerala honeymoon resorts are the best If you want to wake up to breathtaking views and enjoy stunning sunsets, intimate beach walks, and private candlelight dinners. All summing up to a dreamy honeymoon filled with love and lasting memories.1. Niraamaya Retreats Surya SamudraLocated in Kovalam, Niraamaya Retreats Surya Samudra, offers stunning views, as the property is placed on the cliff, and is one of the best honeymoon resorts in Kerala. It is set in beautiful green gardens and has cozy cottages built in the traditional Kerala style. Thus Niraamaya Retreats is one of the best resorts in Kerala for honeymoon.The award-winning resort offers a luxurious spa, a unique pool carved out of rocks, and a peaceful meditation area – perfect for couples looking for a romantic yet authentic Kerala experience on their honeymoon.Location: P.O, Pulinkudi Road, Vizhinjam, Kovalam, Thiruvananthapuram Kerala, India Amenities: Best Ayurvedic spa treatments, pool2. Turtle On The BeachThe Gokulam Grand Turtle on the Beach Resort in Kovalam is one of the best resorts In Kerala for Honeymoon and it invites you for a luxurious and blissful holiday experience. It is a property with a breathtaking view of the Arabian Sea. Enjoy the laid-back lifestyle in luxurious rooms and suites, multi-cuisine restaurants, holistic spas, and yoga centres.This makes it one of the best Kerala honeymoon resorts. This luxurious 5-star resort is located right in front of Eve’s beach. It has a beautifully decorated Mediterranean restaurant and a modern massage facility. The rooms are very well-maintained and fully furnished. Location: TC 63/512 TO 523, Beach Rd, Kovalam, Kerala.Amenities: Swimming pool, Indoor games, Fitness centre, Multi-cuisine restaurant, Minibar.Suggested Read: 6 Incredible Honeymoon Packages Under 70k3.  The Leela KovalamThe Leela Kovalam located on the cliff of the seaside town of Kovalam, is one the best luxury honeymoon resorts in Kerala. The 67-acre resort includes the historic Halcyon Castle, which is now called The Kovalam Palace. You can indulge in adventure activities like beach boating, snorkelling, and scuba diving in this. Location: Kovalam Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala – 695527Amenities: A rooftop bar, a pool, and an on-site restaurant.4. Poovar Island ResortPoovar Island Resort is surrounded by endless golden beaches, swaying coconut trees, the vast Arabian Sea, and lush green gardens. It is one of the best Kerala honeymoon resorts for newlyweds seeking privacy and seclusion.Couples can choose to stay in charming land cottages or unique floating cottages on the water —– both offering a dreamy experience. It’s one of the best honeymoon resorts in Kerala, providing amenities like a swim-up bar, multi-cuisine restaurant, outdoor pool, relaxing spa, and a fitness centre.Location: A unit of Floatels, India Private Limited, K.P. VII/911 Pozhiyoor, Trivandrum, KeralaAmenities: Multi-cuisine restaurant, outdoor pool, relaxing spa, and a fitness centreThe Popular Lakeside Resorts in Kerala for Honeymoon1. Kumarakom Lake ResortKumarakom Lake Resort located on the banks of the Lake Vembanad with its lush trees and green backwaters is one of the best honeymoon resorts in Kerala where you can enjoy luxury stays at presidential suites, heritage villas, pavilion rooms. Also, you will have an opportunity to indulge in fun activities like sightseeing trips, village walks, and sunset cruises. Location: Kumarakom North Post, KottayamAmenities: Infinity pool, fitness centre, Ayurveda treatments2. Taj Kumarakom ResortTaj Kumarakom Resort is one of the popular 5-star resorts and one of the luxury Honeymoon Resorts in Kerala. It’s the perfect peaceful getaway for honeymooners to unwind, rejuvenate, and create lasting memories together in a picturesque lakeside setting as the resort is located on the shores of Kumarakom Lake.This being one of the luxury resorts in Kerala for honeymoon promises unique experiences that will make you feel like you’re in a heavenly paradise. The resort offers a minibar, 24-hour in-room dining services, Outdoor swimming pool.Location: 1/404,Kumarakom, Kottayam Amenities: minibar, 24-hour in-room dining services, Outdoor swimming pool.3. Lemon Tree Vembanad Lake ResortLemon Tree Vembanad resort is one of the best lakeside resorts in Kerala for honeymoon. This resort in Alleppey is a great option for honeymoon couples on a budget. It is located right on the beautiful Vembanad Lake. This is also one of the luxury honeymoon resorts in Kerala and has a cheerful and relaxed vibe with simple yet pleasant decor, making it a wonderful choice for newlyweds. All the rooms face the lake, offering lovely views. Being one of the best honeymoon resorts in Kerala it also has an Ayurveda spa that promises to help you unwind through relaxing treatments and therapies.You can enjoy a variety of tasty dishes at the Citrus Cafe, from homestyle cooking to local Kerala specialities to international cuisines.Location: Janasakthi Road, Kayippuram, Muhamma, Alleppey.Amenities: Ayurveda spa, Best culinary experienceSuggested Read: 14 Honeymoon Places Under 40K4. Backwater RipplesBackwater Ripples Resort is a cosy and comfortable resort spread across 10 acres of lush green surroundings with backwater canals at Kumarakom. It falls under the backwater Kerala Honeymoon Resorts.  It faces the beautiful Vembanad Lake, and calming distant greenery and is one of the best honeymoon resorts in Kerala. Following the traditional Kerala style, it is one of the luxury honeymoon resorts in Kerala that features private balconies facing the lake, allowing guests to relax and enjoy the stunning lake views. The swimming pool merges seamlessly with the Vembanad Lake, so you can take a refreshing dip while soaking in the picturesque lake scenery.You can also experience the beauty of the area by taking a boat ride or shikhara right from the resort’s location. Enjoy breathtaking sunrise and sunset views.  And give yourself opportunities to immerse in the local scenery and life. This resort offers an authentic and blissful backwater experience.Location: Nazareth, Church Road, Kumarakom, KeralaAmenities: A range of water sports & indoor games, luxury rooms with private balconiesLively & Vibrant Hill Station Resorts1. The Windflower Resort & SpaIt is one of the stunning honeymoon resorts in Kerala located in Wayanad on a hill. It offers couples the choice to stay in rooms with beachfront or non-beachfront views. It’s surrounded by lush plantations of coffee, pepper, rubber, cardamom, and more – making it one of the luxury resorts in Kerala for honeymoon. The resort has an exciting adventure zone where newlyweds can try activities like archery, paintball, hiking, and more. Location:  Annapoorna Estate, Resurvey No. 330/1, Achooranam Village, Vythiri Taluk, Wayanad District, Kerala.Amenities: Ayurvedic spa and an infinity pool, AC, rustic furniture, and personal safes2. Elixir Hills Suites Resort & SpaLocated amidst the mountains, and tea plantations, Elixir Hills Resort offers a luxurious getaway in a breathtaking natural setting. Surrounded by dense rainforests, this eco-friendly and one of the luxury resorts in Kerala for honeymoon is a beautiful landscape. One of the best things to do in Munnar on honeymoon is to enjoy stunning views of the lush forests and encounter native wildlife on a daily basis.Built with a modern touch, Elixir Hills Resort has the largest luxury suites in Munnar, set against stunning natural backdrops. The elegant interiors use natural colors and wooden furnishings that complement the serene surroundings, creating a calm and tranquil ambience indoors. This is one of the best honeymoon resorts in Kerala promising a truly rejuvenating escape in Munnar’s captivating hill scenery.Location: Near Letchmi Tea Estate, Munnar, KeralaAmenities: Infinity pool, on-site restaurant3. Bansura Hill ResortWhile many honeymoon resorts in Kerala bring you close to nature, Banasura Hill Resort immerses you in nature itself.  The unique Earth Homes are built using mud excavated right from the resort site. Nature lovers can explore trails for casual or adventurous trekking.The Bamboo Restaurant called Gua Dua serves authentic Indian cuisine with a healthy twist. Banasur Ayur, the resort’s Ayurvedic centre, offers various therapeutic packages to help you de-stress and rejuvenate.With its eco-friendly accommodations, nature activities, local cultural experiences, and focus on wellness, this resort ensures you deeply connect with Kerala’s natural surroundings during your honeymoon getaway.Location: Vellamunda, Wayanad, Kerala.Amenities: Bamboo restaurant, Bansur Ayurvedic centre4. Mountain Shadows ResortMountain Shadows Resort is located amidst the dense, beautiful natural surroundings of Wayanad. It’s located on a green hilltop. The luxurious living spaces are eco-friendly, allowing you to stay in harmony with nature. Despite being a premium 5-star resort with top amenities, it offers a tranquil stay immersed in nature.Relax by the resort’s pool and take a dip while soaking in the magnificent mountain views. With its scenic hilltop location amidst lakes and forests, luxurious eco-friendly villas, tranquil amenities, and natural surroundings, this resort promises a truly rejuvenating nature retreat in Wayanad.Location: Kuttiyamvayal, Padinjarathara, Wayanad, KeralaAmenities: Private Pool, on-site restaurant, Indore gamingSuggested Read: 25 Best Honeymoon Destinations In India5. Dream Catcher Plantation ResortDream Catcher Plantation Resort offers a unique accommodation experience. Though simple, these tree houses are tastefully furnished and very comfortable, providing all the basic amenities like 24-hour hot/cold water supply and power backup.To keep guests entertained, the resort organizes fun activities like trekking adventures and visits to the surrounding plantations.Staying in these elevated tree houses allows you to truly immerse yourself in nature while still enjoying modern comforts. It promises a memorable stay amidst lush green surroundings.Location: Ratnagiri, Tea Company Bisonvalley Road, Munnar, Idukki District, KeralaAmenities: Spa, Swimming pool, Adventure activities6. Devonshire GreensThis is a fancy 4-star resort hotel in Kerala, surrounded by green tea plantations. It’s a very popular place for couples on their honeymoon. The resort has a restaurant that serves many different types of local Kerala food specialties. It also has an Ayurvedic spa called Tamas that provides professional spa treatments and services.It is one of the luxury honeymoon resorts in Kerala, that offers room types including  Sunrise Premium Rooms, Valley View Premium Rooms, and Suites. If you want to drink coffee or tea outside, there is an outdoor coffee shop called “Beans and Leaves” that serves coffee, tea, and snacks. Overall, it’s a high-end leisure resort set in a beautiful tea plantation setting that is especially popular with honeymooning couples.Location: Attukad Waterfall Road, Pallivasal, Munnar, KeralaAmenities: Fall in Greens – Multicuisine restaurant, Beans and Leaves – Coffee shop, Tamas – ayurvedic centre,  Torrent – Health club7. Vythiri Village ResortVythiri Village is a 5-star resort located in the hills of Wayanad. It has great views of the Karanchi Stream and Chembra Peak that guests can enjoy from their rooms in the morning.There are 6 different restaurants on the 22-acre resort property. Each restaurant serves tasty food to satisfy all food preferences.It’s a luxurious resort surrounded by nature, with plenty of recreational options and dining choices for a relaxing honeymoon getaway in the hills.Location: NH-766, Near Vythiri Town, Vythiri P.O Wayanad – 673 576, KeralaAmenities: Yoga classes, Spa, Health club, Swimming pool, Outdoor activities like zip-lining and archery8. Nature Zone ResortNature Zone Resort is a luxurious yet eco-friendly resort surrounded by nature, perfect for an unforgettable honeymoon experience. The unique treehouses allow you to stay amidst nature while having minimal impact on the environment. The treehouses are very spacious and have balconies offering beautiful views of the forest and valley.The resort keeps visitors entertained by organizing many fun outdoor activities such as rock climbing, rappelling, and mountain biking. There are also lighter activities within the resort like soft trekking (gentle hiking) and tours of the plantations on the property. It provides a peaceful natural setting combined with luxurious treehouse accommodations and a range of adventurous and relaxing activities – ideal for couples looking for an exciting yet serene honeymoon surrounded by nature without compromising on comfort and amenities.Location: Pulippara, Letchmi Road, Near KSRTC Depot, Old Munnar, Kerala Amenities: Tea Plantation Walk, Jungle trekking, Sunset View Point, and Bird watching to name a fewClassic Heritage and Cultural ResortsKerala is home to many of the best hotels that blend modern luxury with the region’s rich cultural heritage, providing an immersive experience for honeymooners.1. TridentTrident, Cochin is an elegant resort that is a perfect honeymoon destination. It combines modern design with traditional architectural styles. This is one of the best honeymoon resorts in Kerala that mixes influences from the Portuguese, British, and Dutch as well as local Kerala/Carnatic styles.It is considered one of the best resorts in Kerala for honeymoon couples. The resort has a beautiful courtyard where couples can spend romantic evenings together.Guests can relax and rejuvenate at the Ayurvedic spa or take a dip in the outdoor pool.The resort is known for providing a romantic, couple-friendly environment. It is located close to great local attractions like the Kerala Kathakali Centre and the Jew Town area.It offers honeymooning couples an elegant yet culturally rich experience by blending modern amenities with local heritage and architectural influences, along with a serene atmosphere.Location: Bristow Road, Willingdon Island, Cochin, KeralaAmenities: Fitness centre, spa, Bar, Seafood grill2. Ashirwad Heritage ResortAshirwad Heritage Resort is located on the banks of the Vembanad lake in Kumarakom, Kerala. It is considered one of the best resorts in Kerala for honeymoon couples because it offers a private and romantic environment.It is a 4-star heritage resort with beautifully designed rooms that blend Western and traditional Kerala styles and influences. The best part is that from your room, you can enjoy beautiful views of paddy fields, stunning sunrises, the sounds of birds chirping, and the lovely backwaters.The resort is located close to popular attractions like the Bay Island Driftwood Museum. It provides a dreamy setting for honeymooning couples – with a mix of natural scenery, privacy, cultural design influences, and proximity to local places of interest. Couples can experience a romantic getaway while soaking in Kerala’s nature and heritage.Location: SH 42, Chakrampady Vayitharamattom, Kottayam, Kumarakom, KeralaAmenities: Swimming pool, Banquet Facilities, Conference Hall, Restaurant3. Wayanad SilverwoodWayanad Silverwood Resort is one of the best honeymoon resorts in Kerala for couples. It provides excellent hospitality inspired by the rich culture of Kerala.The resort is located on the banks of Banasura Sagar lake. The rooms have private balconies that offer beautiful views of the surroundings.Aside from the lovely setting, the resort also offers fun activities for guests like cooking classes, club activities, fishing, and nature walks around the property.The design and style of the resort have a colonial feel, with features like traditional clothing for staff, local artefacts, and decor items used throughout.It combines traditional Keralite culture and hospitality with modern amenities and activities in a picturesque lakeside setting – making it an ideal honeymoon destination to experience the natural beauty and heritage of the region.Location: Manjoora P.O, Wayanad-673 575, KeralaAmenities: Infinity pool, Dine&View, Fitness centre, Clubhouse, Convention centre, Kids play areaTips for Planning the Perfect Honeymoon in KeralaTo explore honeymoon resorts in Kerala, you need to discuss and plan the journey ahead.  Be sure to check out Kerala travel tips to make the best out of your Honeymoon.Explore Nature’s Beauty: Kerala has many beautiful natural places for couples. Visit Munnar for its lush green tea gardens and hills. Take a houseboat ride in the serene Alleppey backwaters. Or go trekking and camping in Wayanad’s forests to spot wildlife like birdwatching etc.Luxurious Stays: Choose from luxurious resorts, heritage hotels in old palaces/forts, or unique eco-friendly tree house accommodations. The resorts serve authentic Kerala cuisine and offer traditional Ayurvedic spa treatments for relaxation.Experience Local Culture: Immerse in Kerala’s vibrant culture – watch mesmerising Kathakali dance shows, visit beautifully carved ancient temples, and shop for spices at colourful local markets.With scenic natural landscapes, rich heritage, warm hospitality, and activities for romance and relaxation – Kerala promises newlywed couples an unforgettable honeymoon full of cherished memories.So plan in advance, choose your perfect stay and activities based on your interests, and soak in the enchanting sights, sounds, and experiences this tropical paradise has to offer.ConclusionKerala is truly a paradise for honeymooners, offering a perfect blend of natural beauty, cultural richness, and luxurious accommodations. With its serene backwaters, lush tea plantations, pristine beaches, and misty hill stations, the state is an ideal destination for honeymoon.When planning to choose your honeymoon resorts in Kerala, it’s essential to select the right resort that aligns with your preferences and interests. Whether you desire a romantic beachfront escape, a lakeside setting, a rejuvenating hill station getaway, or an immersive cultural experience, Kerala has a diverse range of resorts to cater to every couple’s needs.For those seeking a peaceful and secluded beach holiday, honeymoon resorts in Kerala like Niraamaya Retreats Surya Samudra and The Leela Kovalam offer luxurious accommodations with direct access to stunning beaches. Alternatively, couples who crave the serenity of the backwaters can indulge in the charm of resorts like Kumarakom Lake Resort and Taj Kumarakom Resort, where they can unwind on traditional houseboats or enjoy breathtaking lake views.For couples who find solace in the embrace of nature, hill station honeymoon resorts in Kerala such as Elixir Hills Suites Resort & Spa and Banasura Hill Resort provide an opportunity to reconnect with the great outdoors while indulging in modern comforts. These resorts offer unique experiences like staying in eco-friendly tree houses, exploring tea plantations, and indulging in adventure activities like trekking and rock climbing.Those seeking a deeper connection with Kerala’s rich heritage and culture can opt for the best honeymoon resorts in Kerala like Trident Cochin and Ashirwad Heritage Resort, which seamlessly blend traditional architecture, art, and hospitality with modern amenities, creating an authentic and immersive experience.Regardless of your choice, honeymoon resorts in Kerala promise to pamper you with world-class facilities, exceptional service, and a wide range of activities to suit every couple’s idea of a romantic getaway. From savoring authentic Kerala cuisine to indulging in rejuvenating Ayurvedic treatments, from exploring local markets to witnessing mesmerizing cultural performances, the possibilities for creating unforgettable memories are endless.So, embark on a journey of love and enchantment with the best honeymoon resorts in Kerala, where every moment promises to be a cherished treasure for a lifetime.Get exclusive travel insights & updates into your inbox!Subscribe *By clicking subscribe you'll receive emails from WanderOn.You have already subscribed our newsletter!Thanks for Subscribing our newsletter!Shrutika Parab★★★★★24 May 2024“Thank you Team Wanderon for the amazing Ladakh Experience.
